mapper.select: /* chn.bhmc.dms.sal.stm.service.dao.CorporateAvailabilityDAO.selectCorporateAvailabilityCarNmSearch */ SELECT FN_GET_CARLINE_NM(#{carlineCd}) AS CARLINE_NM , FN_GET_MODEL_TP_NM(#{modelCd}, #{ocnCd}) AS MODEL_NM , FN_GET_OCN_NM(#{modelCd}, #{ocnCd}) AS OCN_NM , FN_GET_EXT_COLOR_NM(#{extColorCd}) AS EXT_COLOR_NM , FN_GET_INT_COLOR_NM(#{intColorCd}) AS INT_COLOR_NM FROM DUAL
